basics.name: Amir Gafner
basics.label: Senior Web Developer
basics.summary: Cutting edge front-end development experience in web-based systems, Front-end architecture to W3C-established web standards by maintaining cross-browser/cross-platform compatibility through validation, usability, interface design and user experiences. 8+ years of experience - JavaScript expert, advanced Node, Python.

work.summary: Reactful helps convert visitors by creating powerful Reactions built on top of React/Redux, Node, Webpack, ES2017 and isomorphic render
highlights: Developed and designed Reactful web application from the bottom up, designed, implemented, tested, ensured cross-browser and cross platform compatibility, Serving 800k unique sessions daily.
Crafted user experiences, integrated design and system architecture. Implemented technologies including GCS, Stripe, Intercom and Segment
Responsible for team repository, releases and feature roadmaps.

work.summary: Airbnb management service built with Mean.js stack. Working in small agile team, building a real time dashboard/admin tool and backend
highlights: Developing single page application for managing reservations, booking insights history, along with pricing analytics and listing stats.
Integrating Stripe and Firebase for real time operation system.
Managing more than 150k+ listings all over the globe.

work.summary: Somoto Ltd. offers various solutions to software developers, publishers, advertisers, and Website owners for the distribution of software worldwide.
highlights: Responsible for a reporting platform with data tables, graphs and charts serving 1000K+ users with 8M installs per day.
Using Backbone and Marionette over NginX and Php Symfony framework.
Building cross browser dynamically loaded extensions components used by 50M users bringing major impact on Mobile hands free Installs.

work.summary: Moovu helps discover, collect and share videos from YouTube, Facebook, Vimeo.
highlights: Developing Facebook connected Chrome extension for watching and collecting videos downloaded by 5M users.
Build a tool for creating a short meme gif youtube preview using canvas, creating gifs for viral video feed.
Working in close collaboration within a cross-functional team to define and develop product roadmaps.

keywords: Music, Art, Philosophy, International Relations, Mars
